text: @realDonaldTrump you also pass a staggering number of 100,000 casualties due to your lack of response from the time you were informed by all kinds of experts around you. Stop patting yourself on the back, you deserve a kick in the ass... #COVID19  sad day for the US.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
